data.title: Chapter Locator
data.text:
Member Benefits

Professional Development

Learn how Delta Sigma Pi helps you build critical skills.

Career Development

Delta Sigma Pi can help you develop professionally and expand your network.

Collegiate Leadership Development

See how Delta Sigma Pi fosters leadership skills in collegiate members.

Networking

Discover how networking through Delta Sigma Pi can benefit you.

Scholarships

Resources for Continuing Education

These partners provide opportunities to meet your educational goals.

Product & Service Discounts

Take advantage of these valuable discounts on products and services.

Travel Discounts

Your membership gives you great rates on hotels and car rentals.

Employment Opportunities

Our career partners hire Deltasigs for internships and full-time positions.

Career Development Partners

Use these partner services to improve your professional skills.

Deltasig Merchandise

Find an array of Deltasig clothing, jewelry, accessories, gifts and more.

#DSPHigherStandard

General Resources

General Fraternity Information

Start here to review commonly needed information.

Deltasig Facts & Terminology

Find answers to your questions and learn proper terminology.

Delta Sigma Pi 101

Watch these modules to deepen your understanding and sharpen your skills.

Fraternity Logos

Download these official Deltasig logos and images.

Fraternity Songs

Learn the words to our official song, Rose of Deltasig.

Educational & Leadership Consultation Program

Read more about our Consultation Program and the benefits of it.

Provincial Resources

Find resources for each province's council meetings.

Chapter Leadership Funds

Learn how these funds help chapters attend Deltasig educational programs.

Scholarship Key Award

Universities can honor graduating students with the highest GPA.

#DSPHigherStandard

Chapter Operation Resources

Leadership Positions

Resources for President, SVP, VPPE, VPF, VPCO, Chancellor, VPPA, VPCS, VPSA, VPAR, Chapter Advisor and DD.

Use these resources to help your chapter be the most successful it can.

Collegiate Forms and Manuals

Easily find helpful manuals and forms to help manage your chapter.

The Hub

Learn more about the Hub and how to access it.

Policies & Bylaws

Access national policies and bylaws, along with other helpful resources.

Chapter Management Program

Learn to effectively manage risk and create a safe environment.

Merchandise Policy

Review this information to ensure your products are compliant.

Insurance

Learn more about insurance coverage for chapters.

Collegiate Chapter Awards

Operational Webinars

Watch previously recorded webinars covering a variety of topics.

Opportunities to Give

Donate

Make a gift and support business leaders of today and tomorrow.

Deltasig For Life Donor Program

Make a gift and support business leaders of today and tomorrow.

Funds

Investors Roundtable

Learn how you can take a seat at the Deltasig Investors Roundtable.

Matching Gifts

Double your impact by applying for matching funds through your employer.

Planned Giving

See how you can leave a legacy of support to Delta Sigma Pi.

Where Your Gift Goes

Learn more about how your donations are used to support Delta Sigma Pi.

#DSPHigherStandard

Grand Chapter Congress

Register

Register for our 56th Grand Chapter Congress in Palm Springs.

Hotel & Travel

Learn more about our host hotel and available travel discounts.

Congress Host City

See what Palm Springs has to offer and start planning today!

Schedule

View a tentative program of events throughout Congress.

What to Expect

Learn what to expect while you are at Grand Chapter Congress.

Testimonial Form

Submit a testimonial to be read during the final business session.

Candidates

Members running for an elected position should read the complete process.

Chapters and Delegates

Learn the duties of delegates and review other resources.

GCC Resources

Check out these general resources for Grand Chapter Congress.

Sponsor This Event

Learn the benefits of your company sponsoring Grand Chapter Congress.

GCC History

This archive lists each Congress including the GP elected at each.

The Collegiate Standard

Find high-quality, custom-designed Delta Sigma Pi jewelry and more.

Mecca

Show your Deltasig pride with apparel, accessories, and more.

Fraternal Composite Service

Get your chapter handcrafted picture composites at a great rate.

C.C. Creations

C.C. Creations has partnered with Delta Sigma Pi to offer nametags to members.

Deltasig Marketplace

Show your Deltasig pride with apparel, accessories, and more.
